name: Breathing
description:
Step on the snow

Rules:

First, you need to keep your breathing rhythm!

4s in this level! This means that you need to breathe in 4s and then breathe out 4s.

Second, you need to walk towards the fire! And once there's no fire, you need to stop and take a rest.

Don't get lost in the snow. Good luck!

Controls:

Space to breathe;

Up Left Right arrow to move. Up Left or Up Right means that you need to press two buttons at the same time.

Credits:

Designer & Programmer: Dabu

Artist: Raini
